name: SEVEN SOULS*
description:
Have you ever wondered what happens to your cat when he is not home?
This is a CAT adventure... have fun!

MOBILE FRIENDLY( take a while to load)

CONTROLS

P: PAUSE (or TOUCH PLAYER)

W:  jump

A: Walk Left

D: Walk Right

S: Atack ( Distance atack will restore after 10 seconds) 

NO SAVE: You will receive a PASSWORD to restore your coordinates to each World

****  Looking for BUGS, please leave a comment bellow.
